metadata.title: CVE-2024-28182 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: nghttp2 is an implementation of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol version 2in C. The nghttp2 library prior to version 1.61.0 keeps reading theunbounded number of HTTP/2 CONTINUATION frames even after a stream isreset to keep HPACK context in sync. This causes excessive CPU usage todecode HPACK stream. nghttp2 v1.61.0 mitigates this vulnerability bylimiting the number of CONTINUATION frames it accepts per stream. There isno workaround for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: nghttp2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
